content:
I am Hindu,talk to me and I will tell you tales of
1) How kashmiri Pandits became refugees in their own country.
2) How hindu families are migrating from Kairana
3) How Hindu population has drastically decreased in Pakistan,Bangladesh
4) How Allah Hu Akbar scares me.
,#,TalkToHindu

Talk to me and I'll tell you
1) How raiders from middle East raided Hindustan and killed Hindus
2) How Hindus in the middle ages were given 2options either to convert or be killed
3) How a Sikh guru was burned in boil water
4) How we have been ruled by Gandhi(Khan) and Italians

I'll tell you all the tales about
1)How our heritage was destroyed.
2)Nalanda was burned.
3)How peacefully other religions have existed in our country.
4) That we have never tried to conquer any country.
5)How we have been plundered by Muslims and Christian
,#,TalkToHindu
